review: It worked as advertised...and for the price how can you go wrong.  Best results was with a PC or Droid device....much more difficult to interface with an Apple device.  If you have all apples in your house buy Apple TV, a few more bucks but no interface issues.
author: Ernie Judson

review: I just set it up last night and it works fine. There is a bit of a delay, but it is pretty short (less than 10 seconds). It would be nice if the power cord was longer (I have my TV on top of a tall cabinet) and it took me a minute to figure out some of the features, like how to rewind, but those are minor downsides. All in all it seems to work well, especially for the price.
author: CarolineV

review: If you want to use this for streaming live sports, I would not recommend it. The output is choppy and the quality is lacking. If you want to use it for netflix or hulu etc, you should probably be okay.
